alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Hooker; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 3:22AM CDT until July 07 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CDT/245 AM MDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHERRY...NORTHERN HOOKER AND NORTHWESTERN THOMAS COUNTIES... At 321 AM CDT/221 AM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 16 miles southwest of Merritt Reservoir to 7 miles northeast of Mullen to 19 miles southwest of Seneca, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mullen, Seneca, Brownlee, Highway 97 crossing the North Loup River, Marsh Flat, Norway, Giant Hill, Highway 97 crossing Big Creek, Hecla and Kelso. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 172 and 206. Highway 97 between mile markers 55 and 108. Highway 83 between mile markers 157 and 161. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
